channel.title: OSS on Haruaki TAMADA

item.title: lioss
item.description: ğŸ—£ Overview License identifying tool for OSS projects. This tool has license database, and analyzes given license by $k$-gram, word frequencies, or tfidf algorithm. ğŸº Install $ brew tap tamada/brew # <- the first time only. $ brew install lioss ğŸ³ Docker tamada/lioss (https://hub.docker.com/r/tamada/lioss) 1.0.0, latest 0.9.0 $ docker run -it --rm -v $PWD:/home/lioss tamada/lioss:latest [OPTIONS] [ARGUMENTS...] ğŸŒ Web pages Project page on GitHub https://github.
